                  Xilisoft DPG Converter 5.1.23 build-0515 + Keys



Xilisoft DPG Converter is the right solution for Nintendo DS fans to decode nearly 
all video and audio formats including AVI, MPEG, H.264/AVC, 3GP, VOB, DAT, WMV, 
MP4, DivX, MOV, RM, ASF, WMA, WAV, M4A, AAC, AC3, OGG, CUE, APE, CDA and convert 
to DPG/DPG2/DPG3/DPG4 video or MP3/MP2 audio.

No other plug-ins or programs are needed for this DPG video converter to convert 
videos to DPG, which distinguishes Xilisoft DPG Converter from other similar 
software and makes the DPG video conversion easier to handle than others. 
Adjustable FPS makes you get pretty smooth viewing experience, no matter you 
watch movie or animation on DS. 


Convert to DPG videos with high FPS and bit rate, then enjoy smoother and clearer 
videos on your DS!

- Convert other videos like MPEG, H.264/AVC,WMV, MP4, DivX, MOV, 
  AVI to DPG/DPG2/DPG3/DPG4 video
- Extract MP3/MP2 audio from almost all video formats
- Convert WMA, WAV, M4A, AAC, AC3, OGG and such audios to MP3/MP2.


* Transfer videos and audios to Nintendo DS Support decoding all popular video 
and audio formats and converting to DPG/MP3/MP2  

Convert to DPG video
To watch any movie or music video of AVI, MPEG, H.264/AVC, 3GP, VOB, DAT, WMV, 
MP4, DivX, MOV, RM, ASF or other popular format on DS, just convert it to 
DPG/DPG2/DPG3/DPG4 video. 

Convert to MP2 audio
You can also extract the dialogue or background music from the video and convert 
to MP3/MP2 music file and convert audios like WMA, WAV, M4A, AAC, AC3, OGG, CUE, 
APE, CDA to MP3/MP2, which can be played on DS. 

Good animation support
When converting animation file to DPG video, you can get the DPG animation with 
high FPS for playback more smoothly on your DS. 


* High speed and high integration Process one task with multi-thread on 
multi-core, no other plug-ins/programs needed  

High speed with multi-core supported
Capable of detecting CPU configuration automatically and processing one task with 
multi-thread on multi-core CPU, this DPG converter gives you the highest speed to 
convert to DPG video. 

No other plug-ins and programs needed
Xilisoft DPG Converter can convert videos and music without installing any other 
plug-ins and programs, which is the greatest difference from other DPG video 
converter tools. 


* Output video/audio customization Adjust FPS/bit rate, compress/trim files, 
output diverse files from one at one time  

FPS and bit rate adjustable
FPS (Frames per second), bit rate and other parameters can be adjusted freely to 
make your movies, music videos and animations converted to smoother and clearer 
DPG files for your DS. 

File compress
Not to worry the file size is too large anymore, just compress it to the exact 
size you define in the Bitrate Calculator tool. 

Pick up segment
No matter whichever segment you love, you can pick it up by setting its start 
time and duration to convert. 

Convert to DPG/MP2/MP3 files from one simultaneously
To make it easy to output the same file with different formats like DPG, MP3 
and MP2 or different parameter settings like FPS and bit rate at one time, 
Xilisoft DPG Converter allows you to add multiple profiles to the same source 
and convert them in a single click. 


* Preview video and convert videos in batches Preview video before conversion
and convert loaded videos to DPG/MP3/MP2 in batches 

Preview video
Previewing video before conversion can help you ensure that the video to be 
converted is just what you want. 

Batch process and multithreading
Load all the files you want to convert, and click one button to let the DPG video 
converter convert them automatically in batches for you. 

Run in background
To spare more CPU resource for other running applications, you can make it run in 
background. 

Set after done action
Set an after done action as exit, shut down, hibernate or standby before 
conversion to make Xilisoft DPG Converter perform the action automatically 
after conversion completed, and you can go to sleep. 



References 

Output Device Support 
- Nintendo DS 


Input File Format Support
 
- Video: 
VOB HD Video (*.vob), H.264/AVC HD Video (*.mp4), (DVD Video Files), MPEG4 HD 
Video (*.mp4), MPEG2 HD Video (*.mpg; *.mpeg), MPEG4 TS HD Video (*.ts), Quick 
Time HD Video (*.mov), VCD Video File (*.dat), WMV HD Video (*.xwmv), Audio-Video 
Interleaved HD Video (*.avi), M4V, SWF, MKV, DV, DIF, FLV, MJPG, MJPEG, MPG, MP4, 
MPEG, DVR-MS, NUT, MOV, QT, H261, H.264/AVC, RM, TS, RMVB, WMV, YUV, ASF, DAT, 
VOB, MPV, NSV 

- Audio: 
AAC, AC3, AIFF, CDA, APE, CUE, OGG, RA, AU, WAV, WMA, FLAC, MP2, MP3, MPA, RAM 


Output File Format Support 
- Video: DPG, DPG2, DPG3, DPG4 
- Audio: MP3, MP2 
- Images: BMP, GIF, JPEG, PNG 



System Requirements
 
- OS: Microsoft Windows XP (SP2 or later), Windows Vista 
- Processor: 1GHz Intel/AMD processor or above 
- RAM: 256MB RAM (512MB or above recommended) 
- Free Hard Disk: 50MB space for installation 
- Graphic Card: Super VGA (800ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬â€600) resolution, 16-bit graphics card or higher

>>>When using TPB please read these important notes: 
****************************************************

01- Anti-malware apps may warn about keygens, patches, cracks etc because of 
    their capabilities (generating codes, etc). Sometimes also they're added to 
    the virus/spyware database and will be detected as malware. If not trusting 
    keygens, patches, cracks etc don't use them.

02- Before running .exe-files, keygens, patches, cracks etc always check first 
    if they can be unpacked. Often some thirth party added a virus to the 
    original file, repacked it and uploaded it again.

03- Letting antimalware-apps sending scanning-results to their companies can coz
    keygens, patches, cracks etc being added to their virus-database.

04- Firewalls which are set to automatically decide for connections will allow 
    connections for lots of apps & MALWARE!. To avoid so firewalls should be set 
    to decide yourself which connection to allow or not.

05- Usually (new) torrents with extreme many downloads & seeders in a short time 
    are very suspicious! Torrents with a SKULL-logo are trusted.

06- Some (frustrated) people use multiple accounts and post lots of FAKE comments 
    and/or files trying to spread confusion. Usually they NEVER seriously reply 
    on comments and don't have any torrent, or to look reliable just a few.

07- Clicking on unknown links can coz malware being silently installed on a pc!
  
08- In general often there are more fake & negative comments than reliable & 
    positive comments.

09- In some countries uploading/downloading copyright-protected material is 
    forbidden, but showing some appreciation to reliable uploaders is not.

10- Posting FAKE comments & uploads on TPB can result in getting banned from TPB!


For reporting bad or suspicious torrents:  <a href="
